statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); parent=$(basename "$(dirname "$cwd")"); current=$(basename "$cwd"); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.fileMode=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); title='*CC:'; [ -n "$branch" ] && title="$title $branch"; [ -n "$remaining" ] && title=$(printf '%s (%.0f%% remaining)' "$title" "$remaining"); printf '\033]0;%s\007' "$title"; printf "\033[01;34m%s\033[00m" "$parent/$current"; [ -n "$branch" ] && printf " \033[01;32m%s\033[00m" "$branch"; if [ -n "$remaining" ]; then remaining_int=$(printf "%.0f" "$remaining"); if [ "$remaining_int" -ge 50 ]; then color="\033[01;34m"; elif [ "$remaining_int" -ge 20 ]; then color="\033[01;33m"; else color="\033[01;31m"; fi; printf " ${color}%.0f%% remaining\033[00m" "$remaining"; fi; echo
